short_description: pitch-up pizzas is a hamburgers, hot-dogs & sandwiches restaurant based in united kingdom.
long_description: louis spent his days touring extensively in the music industry and will ran a pub in soho. together they decided to combine their skills and set the goal to make the perfect pizza. with the help of their italian culinary maestro and discerning food critic luca, they believe they've mastered the perfect recipe. the brothers spend their summers pitching up at various locations and events around uk with their wood-fired pizza wagon. we can cater for any event, whether it's your daughters wedding, your grans funeral or your dogs bar-mitzvah, we've got you covered. having sampled their pizza, brownies and breakfast baps (not all at the same time) whilst pitched at scott's farm.
business_tags: food catering services | wood fired pizza | pizza ovens | menu and services | pizza bases | food critic | draft beer | day tours | locations and events
generated_description: pitch-up pizzas is a mobile food catering service based in london, england. founded by brothers william and louis, who were both affected by the covid-19 pandemic, the company specializes in artisan wood-fired pizzas. the business operates with the help of italian culinary expert luca, aiming to create the perfect pizza. pitch-up pizzas offers their services at various events and locations across the uk, providing customizable menus and beverages, including cold draft beer.
generated_business_tags: beverage options | artisanal wood-fired pizzas | foodservice | menu customization services | private hire services | mobile catering services | cold draft beer

long_description: two brothers with a passion for pizza slinging the finest wood-fired neapolitan and romana pizzas
